properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 24 SEP THRU 01 OCT BY
   M/V POLARCUS ADIRA TOWING 900 METER
   LONG CABLE IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-55.5S 044-19.3W, 24-55.5S 044-05.8W,
   25-04.3S 043-56.3W, 25-21.6S 043-56.2W,
   25-30.8S 044-06.5W, 25-30.8S 044-22.7W,
   25-22.4S 044-32.8W, 25-07.1S 044-32.1W.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2408/16.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 02 OCT 16.
